properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EX_NO, EX_NM, EX_SUB_NM, EX_IMG FROM EXHIBIT ) WHERE RNUM <= 4

SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, MIN(SPACE_ROOM_PRICE), SPACE_ROOM_FIT, NVL(COUNT(MEMBER_NO),0),SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM FROM SPACE JOIN SPACE_ROOM USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_DIBS USING(SPACE_NO) JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE SPACE_RECO ='Y' GROUP BY SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, SPACE_ROOM_FIT,SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM

SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, MIN(SPACE_ROOM_PRICE), SPACE_ROOM_FIT, NVL(COUNT(MEMBER_NO),0),SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM FROM SPACE JOIN SPACE_ROOM USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_DIBS USING(SPACE_NO) JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) GROUP BY SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, SPACE_ROOM_FIT,SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM

SELECT SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, MIN(SPACE_ROOM_PRICE), SPACE_ROOM_FIT, NVL(COUNT(MEMBER_NO),0),SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM FROM SPACE JOIN SPACE_ROOM USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_TYPE USING (SPACE_TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_DIBS USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) WHERE (SPACE_IMG_LEVEL = 1 OR SPACE_IMG_LEVEL IS NULL) AND ((SPACE_NM || SPACE_SUB_NM || SPACE_ADDR || SPACE_TYPE_NM) LIKE '%'||?||'%') GROUP BY SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM, SPACE_SUB_NM, SPACE_ROOM_FIT,SPACE_IMG_PATH,SPACE_IMG_NM
